thread.section_title: Chinese Laundry Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chinese Laundry | www.chineselaundry.com
thread.title: Charlotte

author: Charlotte
title: Charlotte
text:
I've loved Chinese Laundry since I was a teenager and shopped at Delias - that was a lifetime ago. Still - their recent styles, especially their collab with Kristen Cavallari, is awesome. I purchased the silver pointed loafers.
Though I find their shoes semi narrow or always the kind I need to take a beating in before they are comfy, I turn to their brand for trendy shoes I'd like to invest in but try our first for a season or two to see if the trend is worth it.
I might buy the silver loafers again as they are great snazzy basics. Sadly they cut up the backs of my feet for a month till they break in.
